DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aimed to investigate the effects of salpingectomy and Methotrexate administration on ovarian reserve in ectopic pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Salpingectomy and Single Dose Systemic Methotrexate Treatments on Ovarian Reserve in Ectopic Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: In this study, the effects of unilateral laparoscopic salpingectomy and single dose of systemic Methotrexate administration on ovarian reserve in patients diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy were investigated.
DOC.criteria: ectopic pregnancy diagnosis history of endometriosis, ovarian surgery, systemic chemotherapy, ART treatment. patients treated with multiple doses of methotrexate or different surgical procedure (salpingostomy, milking)
